member.name: T:Topsens.People
member.summary: The people detector operation interface (Dedicated for all third-party cameras).

member.name: M:Topsens.People.Preload(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Preloads resource data to minimize sensor startup delay.
member.returns: if the call succeeds, otherwise refer to for the specific meaning.

member.name: M:Topsens.People.Initialize(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.returns: if the call succeeds, otherwise refer to for the specific meaning.

member.name: M:Topsens.People.SetOrientation(Topsens.Orientation)
member.remarks: Default is . If the setting needs to be changed, call this method before .
member.returns: if the call succeeds, if the people detector has been initialized, otherwise refer to for the specific meaning.

member.name: M:Topsens.People.GetOrientation
member.returns: The depth image orientation set. Returns the default if people detector is closed.

member.name: M:Topsens.People.SetImageFlipped(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets whether the depth image is flipped.
member.remarks: The depth image is flipped by default. If the setting needs to be changed, call this method before .
member.param: The depth image is flipped if true, otherwise not flipped.
member.returns: if the call succeeds, if the people detector has been initialized, otherwise refer to for the specific meaning.

member.name: M:Topsens.People.IsImageFlipped
member.summary: Checks whether the depth image is flipped.
member.remarks: The depth image is flipped by default.
member.returns: True if the depth image is flipped, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Topsens.People.SetMaskEnabled(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets whether to enable user mask.
member.remarks: Default is not enabled. If the setting needs to be changed, call this method before .
member.param: Enabled if true, otherwise not enabled.
member.returns: if the call succeeds, if the people detector has been initialized, otherwise refer to for the specific meaning.

member.name: M:Topsens.People.IsMaskEnabled
member.summary: Checks whether user mask is enabled.
member.returns: True if user mask is enabled, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Topsens.People.Detect(System.Int16[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int64,Topsens.UsersFrame)
member.param: The generated users frame. The frame should be a non-null value, otherwise will be returned.
member.returns: if the call succeeds, otherwise refer to for the specific meaning.
